summary: This document consists of three Capital One Auto Finance letters to Jaime Rivas Williams regarding a vehicle loan account. It includes a welcome letter with account terms and two payment confirmation letters. The documents are financial records showing routine auto loan servicing.

persons.name: Jaime Rivas Williams
persons.context: Individual who obtained an auto loan from Capital One Auto Finance for a vehicle purchase, with payments scheduled from 2017.

events.title: First Auto Loan Payment Due

events.title: Second Verbal Payment Authorization
events.description: Jaime Rivas Williams verbally authorized a payment of $351.27 to Capital One Auto Finance.

keyFacts: Jaime Rivas Williams obtained an auto loan from Capital One Auto Finance with a 72-month term starting with a payment due on January 11, 2017.
The account had a monthly payment of $351.27 and included disclosures about late fees, electronic payments, and credit reporting.
Two payment confirmations show verbal authorizations for electronic funds transfers on March 20, 2017 ($1,638.27) and July 13, 2017 ($351.27).
The documents are routine financial correspondence with no direct mention of Jeffrey Epstein, his associates, or related criminal activities.
The file appears in the Epstein case documents dataset but contains only standard auto loan servicing materials.
